Home > Parking

Parking Holidays

  • New Year’s Day - January 1
  • Martin Luther King, Jr. Birthday - third Monday of January
  • President’s Day - third Monday of February
  • Memorial Day - last Monday of May
  • Independence Day - July 4
  • Labor Day - first Monday of September
  • Thanksgiving Day - fourth Thursday of November
  • Christmas Day - December 25

If any of these holidays falls upon a Sunday, the following Monday is a holiday.

Information provided by Parking Citation Assistance Center

  • City of Oakland
  • your-email@domain.com
  • (800) 500-6484

Last updated: Sep 20, 2014
